summary: 2007 TOYOTA SIENNA XLE  AT THE THREE YEAR AGE, THE REAR BUNGEE'S THAT MOVE THE REAR HATCH UP AND DOWN BEGAN TO FAIL.  TOYOTA RELUCTANTLY (OUT OF WARRANTY) REPLACED.  PRIOR TO, THE HATCH WOULD FALL CONTINUALLY AND STRIKE OUR HEADS.  IN THE SIX MONTHS SINCE, THE HATCH HAS STAYED UP BUT I FEEL THE NEW BUNGEE'S ARE TOO STRONG.  NOW THE AUTOMATIC CLOSING FEATURE HAS FAILED.  YOU HAVE TO REALLY PULL ON THE HATCH TO CLOSE. TOYOTA DENIES ANY "HISTORY" OF ISSUES WITH THE HATCH SYSTEM ON OUR VEHICLE.  *TR
